dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I’ve never seen those before. I don't—
Hopkins’s face quickly turned into a cold frown.
The expression on his face was such a far cry from his sycophancy before Vergilius that it sent shivers down my spine.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: N-no, that's not what I... uh...

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Don’t you know why we bothered to let a fallen Wing’s feather into our Office?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: T-to deal with requests taking place in L Corp. branches more safely...

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Exactly. I didn’t expect much from a low-rank agent.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: You had two simple jobs: lead the way, and tell us how to deal with those Abnormaladies or whatever they're called.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: And now... you're saying you don't know what these monsters are. What are we supposed to do here then, huh?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Gosh, Hopkins, feeling hangry? Go easy on her~
If they are in fact new to Miss Yuri, then these might be another type of entity derived from Abnormalities... Perhaps a new species.
That Corporation might not have had every specimen in their confines, either.
Miss Yuri, there is no reason to lambaste yourself for neglecting to remember what you were never taught.
What’s there to argue about? We only need to beat ‘em to death, don't we?
Give the word, and we’ll do it.
